bug.author: WalGreens2018
bug.description: Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. Conversion fails due to an Input/Output error. To Reproduce Started the conversion of an mp4 file. The program will fail, with the message: <[image2 @ 00000247e004d580] Could not open file : tmpSuperSloMo\input/000001.png av_interleaved_write_frame(): I/O error>. Expected behavior Steps to correct the error message and succeed in converting a video. Interpolated results/error output [image2 @ 00000247e004d580] Could not open file : tmpSuperSloMo\input/000001.png av_interleaved_write_frame(): I/O error frame= 5 fps=0.0 q=-0.0 Lsize=N/A time=00:00:00.03 bitrate=N/A speed=0.0869x video:619kB audio:0kB subtitle:0kB other streams:0kB global headers:0kB muxing overhead: unknown Conversion failed! Desktop (please complete the following information): Windows 10, FFMPEG, Python 3.7
